column2: I must take umbrage with your comment that we are catering to "clueless 20-year-olds." JINYA-Midtown has been open for approximately 15 months
column3: and in that time we have seen a vast array of customers walk through our door
column5: representing nearly every ethnicity and age demographic. Furthermore
column6: I have personally discussed ramen with many of these so-called "clueless 20-year-olds" who have traveled around Asia
column7: have spent years teaching English in Japan
column8: and their opinion of our ramen is diametrically opposed to yours. However
column9: I suppose the one of point of agreement here is that they believe the ramen scene in Houston is still young
column11: and will continue to grow with the proper support from the public and the ability to meet that demand.
